newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: U.S. UNIT OF DUTCH VNU BUYS MARKETING INFO FIRM.
newsitem.headline: U.S. UNIT OF DUTCH VNU BUYS MARKETING INFO FIRM.

text.p: Dutch publisher VNU said on Thursday that one of its U.S. units VNU Marketing Information Services had signed a letter of intent to buy National Decision Systems, a San Diego-based marketing information company.
No financial details were disclosed but VNU said NDS posted 1996 revenues of over $39 million and had 250 employees.
The acquisition was expected to be completed in late May.
VNU also announced the same U.S. unit had signed a marketing agreement with consumer credit and insurance information company Equifax .

"The NDS acquisition and the strategic alliance with Equifax is in line with VNU's strategy to continually strengthen and expand its business information activities in the United States," VNU said in a statement.
VNU Marketing Information is a New York-based subsidiary of VNU USA.
